nodes.text: The Hand was a roleplaying-game adventure in year five of the Living Force campaign. It was the second adventure in the EndTimes trilogy and was written by Morrie Mullins and Jae Walker.

The heroes travel to the Cularin system asteroid belt to meet with Nirama, who wants to tell them a way to defeat Len Markus and the Darkstaff. However, Markus has gotten there first and, along with a group of mercenaries, has captured Nirama.
